description: Forward geocode a place into latitude & longitude.

input.name: mapboxApiKey
input.description: A Mapbox API key from https://www.mapbox.com/.

input.name: data
input.description: An object containing columns and rows.

input.name: placeType
input.description: The type of the geographic feature are available in the Mapbox geocoder. Valid options are `country`, `region`, `postcode`, `district`, `place`, `locality`, `neighborhood`, `address`, and `poi`. Defaults to `country`.

input.name: longitudeColumn
input.description: The source column for the longitude result. Defaults to `longitude`.

input.name: latitudeColumn
input.description: The source column for the latitude result. Defaults to `latitude`.

input.name: resultColumn
input.description: The target column for PlaceType from the query result.

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
